title: A Bollob\'ass-type theorem on singular linear spaces
authors: Erfei Yue, Benjian Lv, P\'eter Sziklai, and Kaishun Wang
abstract:
Bollob\'as-type theorem determines the maximum cardinality of a Bollob\'as
system of sets. The original result has been extended to various mathematical
structures beyond sets, including vector spaces and affine spaces. This paper
generalizes the Bollob\'as-type theorem to singular linear spaces, and
determine the maximum cardinality of (skew) Bollob\'as systems on them.
